verbs.description: Tuesday on ABC ’s The View , [ARG1: former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich] [V: was] [ARG2: the special guest at the hot topics table] , and he did n’t hold back from showing the liberal ladies just how hypocritical some of their views on President Trump were .
